actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to provide for more equitable coverage under the emergency unemployment compensation program.

summary.text: Lowers the rate of unemployment before a State can claim assistance under the Emergency Unemployment Compensation Act of 1971 (Public Law 92-224) to four percent (presently six and one-half percent) for the immediately preceding twelve weeks. percent)

titles.title: A bill to provide for more equitable coverage under the emergency unemployment compensation program.
